scripts.contract-deploy-local: hardhat compile; npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-contract.js --network localhost
scripts.contract-deploy-test-seed-local: hardhat compile; npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-test-seed.js --network localhost
scripts.contract-deploy: hardhat compile; npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-contract.js --network matic
scripts.contract-deploy-test-seed: hardhat compile; npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-test-seed.js --network matic
